name: The confusion is 2D
description:
"The confusion is 2D" is a  short puzzle/platformer/kind of action game.   You will have to complete different levels.   All you have to do is just walk to a door thingy. Sounds simple, right? Well,  in order to get to that damn door you will have to solve puzzles or jump on constantly moving platforms or dodge obstacles just to reach the  thingy that will  get you out of here.

Recommended to people who like to:

- play games

- spend about 15 minutes of free time reaching door thingys 

-  jump and dodge and solve
